verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* end, \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* changed, \w a|strong="H7760"\w* testimony \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* ear, O thou \w that|strong="H0776"\w* rulest \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*: thou \w that|strong="H0776"\w* leadest Joseph \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* sheep. Thou \w that|strong="H0776"\w* sittest upon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cherubims, shine \w forth|strong="H5414"\w*

Before Ephraim, Benjamin, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* Manasses. Stir \w up|strong="H8210"\w* thy \w might|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* come \w to|strong="H0369"\w* save \w us|strong="H5439"\w*.
Convert \w us|strong="H5439"\w*, O God: \w and|strong="H5439"\w* shew \w us|strong="H5439"\w* thy face, \w and|strong="H5439"\w* we shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* saved.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hosts, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* wilt thou \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* against \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy servant?

\w How|strong="H0834"\w* \w long|strong="H0413"\w* wilt thou feed \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* bread \w of|strong="H5921"\w* tears: \w and|strong="H1471"\w* give \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* drink tears \w in|strong="H5921"\w* measure?

Thou hast \w made|strong="H8074"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0398"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* contradiction \w to|strong="H0398"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* neighbours: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* enemies \w have|strong="H3588"\w* scoffed \w at|strong="H0398"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H2142"\w* God \w of|strong="H5771"\w* hosts, convert \w us|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3966"\w* shew thy face, \w and|strong="H3966"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* saved.

Thou hast brought \w a|strong="H5921"\w* vineyard \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt: thou hast cast cut \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Gentiles \w and|strong="H0430"\w* planted \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

Thou wast \w the|strong="H0559"\w* guide \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w its|strong="H3045"\w* journey \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w its|strong="H3045"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: thou plantedst \w the|strong="H0559"\w* roots thereof, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* filled \w the|strong="H0559"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* covered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hills: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* branches thereof \w the|strong="H6440"\w* cedars \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w It|strong="H7725"\w* stretched forth \w its|strong="H7725"\w* branches unto \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w its|strong="H7725"\w* boughs unto \w the|strong="H0834"\w* river.

Why hast thou broken \w down|strong="H3034"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* hedge thereof, \w so|strong="H5608"\w* \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* who pass \w by|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3034"\w* way do pluck it?
The boar out of the wood hath laid it waste: and a singular wild beast hath devoured it.
Turn again, O God of hosts, look down from heaven, and see, and visit this vineyard:
And perfect the same which thy right hand hath planted: and upon the son of man whom thou hast confirmed for thyself.
Things set on fire and dug down shall perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.
Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand: and upon the son of man whom thou hast confirmed for thyself.
And we depart not from thee, thou shalt quicken us: and we will call upon thy name.
O Lord God of hosts, convert us: and shew thy face, and we shall be saved.
